CustomField.description:
Optional. When a "Group" is assigned, all Messages (across types!) will be processed in order of publishing within the group for each subscription.
If a message is dead lettered, processing cannot continue on subsequent messages in the group
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Optional. When a "Group" is assigned, all Messages (across types!) will be processed in order of publishing within the group for each subscription.
If a message is dead lettered, processing cannot continue on subsequent messages in the group
CustomField.label: Group Id
